summary: This document is an email forwarding a court order in the case US v. Maxwell (20cr330) from Judge Alison J. Nathan's chambers to prosecutors, with a request to discuss. It indicates an order was issued on November 6, 2021, to be filed publicly on the following Monday.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: Issued the court order in the US v. Maxwell case; her chambers forwarded the order to prosecutors.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the forwarded court order from Judge Nathan's chambers.

persons.name: Laura Menninge
persons.context: Listed as a recipient of the forwarded court order from Judge Nathan's chambers.

connections.description: Judge Nathan's chambers communicated a court order to counsel Pagliuca in the US v. Maxwell case.
Judge Nathan's chambers communicated a court order to counsel Menninge in the US v. Maxwell case.

events.title: Court Order Issued in US v. Maxwell
events.description: Judge Alison J. Nathan issued an order in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20cr330), to be filed on the public docket the following Monday.

keyFacts: The document is an email forwarding a court order in the case US v. Maxwell (docket number 20cr330).
Judge Alison J. Nathan issued the order on November 6, 2021, with plans to file it publicly on the following Monday.
The email was sent from Judge Nathan's chambers to prosecutors, including Jeff Pagliuca and Laura Menninge, requesting confirmation of receipt.
